scripts.package: npm un --no-save @essent/serverless-plugin-canary-deployments && npm pack ../ && npm i --no-save @essent/serverless-plugin-canary-deployments-1.0.0.tgz && sls package -s dev
scripts.deploy: npm un --no-save @essent/serverless-plugin-canary-deployments && npm pack ../ && npm i --no-save @essent/serverless-plugin-canary-deployments-1.0.0.tgz && sls deploy -s dev
